title: DRRMLIMS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 422 Nursing officer Posts
description: Dr Ram Manohar Lohia Institute of Medical Sciences (DRRMLIMS) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the 422 vacancies for Nursing Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc Nursing, Diploma, and GNM can grab this chance and apply for the DRRMLIMS Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on...
